contents.name: README
contents.contents: My name is Mark Randhawa and I'm a Web developer. I'm currently looking for a junior developer role. You can contact me at mark.randhawa@gmail.com or follow me on Twitter @markrandhawa.

contents.name: samp.lr
contents.description: A keyboard drum machine, allowing you to create your own songs using the samples provided.
